page.title: 07EMPLOYMENT
page.content: Jobs around Risca are very scares. Most people find it very hard to find a job, but people who don't find a job go on the dole (the dole is where people collect money of the social security) However,there are large firms not to far away. Thats why most people,have to travel to and from work. After the age of 60 (women) and 65 (men) you can retire from your work.Then you recieve and old age pension. Some women don't mind not having a job because they have young children to look after. The people which have children over five is able to go to work because their children go to school. Firms sell the products to different places like shops, chemists, garages, they then sell it to their customers and make a profit.
